input.sentences: my friend and i decided to spend the day together and paint our faces .
we went to my fathers office and he was sleeping .
outside of the office the fields had become drenched with rain .
we watched a waterfall pour water in the trees .
we climbed to the top of one of the houses and got a shot of the sunset .
output.sentences: Two theatre actors getting ready for a big show.
Meanwhile, their mom is sleeping at the office instead of getting ready to go see her daughters.
She finally wakes up and runs home.
She drives by to see if they are at the waterfall their favorite spot behind their house.
She returns to her home and finds a note from her daughters saying, "Remember the show is at 8:00 PM."
